About.Hours & facilities: Open by appointment; closed weekends and Public Holidays. General reference assistance available. Copying services available for books, journals and original records to A3. Introductory brochure available.

About.Access: At least one week's advance notice of visit required. Proof of identity required.

About.Major holdings: Queensland Country Womens Associations: Minutes, Photographs 1922- .

About.Guides: Entries in National Library of Australia Guide to Collections of Manuscripts to Relating to Australia.
